New Playground At Rosalie Park

Location: Shenton Park, Australia
Date: 1/12/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

Rosalie Park is a large recreational space that’s popular with families and dog walkers, with a variety of sport pitches and facilities used by local clubs. This unique playground features rainbow themed steps leading up to a slide and doubles up as a fun interactive element.Rosehill TPV® provides a colourful softfall surface that protects against any accidents. Its unbeatable UV stability means it is perfect for outdoor areas, ensuring surfaces for playgrounds and sports areas, are safe even after long exposure to extreme environmental conditions.Create stunning, vibrant surfaces with Rosehill TPV®'s palette of 22 colours. Add motifs or enhance fun-filled play areas as Rosehill TPV® blends aesthetics and safety, whilst giving you the creative freedom to bring any vision to life.Thanks to <a href="https://perthplaygroundandrubber.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Perth Playground & Rubber</a> and <a href="https://www.surfacedesigns.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Surface Designs TPV</a>
